name: Candy Stacker with Sweet Cup-Cake Cotton Tower
name_original: Candy Stacker with Sweet Cup-Cake Cotton Tower
description:
*****
Got A Sweet Tooth? Candy Stacker will let you play with Delicious Candy until you start yearning for bread and broccoli!
*****
Stack as many Delicious Candy Pieces as you possibly can without tilting the Sweet Candy Tower and losing everything!
*****
Fun Multiplayer Mode to battle your Friends in Real-Time, and Singleplayer Mode if you want to refine your Candy Tower Building Skills alone!
*****
Do Not Let This Game Slip Past You - This Is Great Fun! Just check our screenshots if all this Candy Talk hasn't convinced you yet!
